parameters.query: DELETE FROM members WHERE id = {{ $('Church Member API1').item.json.body.data.id }}

SELECT 
  m.*,
  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(mp.phone_type, ':', mp.phone_number) SEPARATOR '|') as phones,
  me.company_name, me.designation, me.profession, me.is_employed, me.employment_start_date,
  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(fr.relationship_type, ':', rm.first_name, ' ', rm.last_name) SEPARATOR '|') as family_members
FROM members m
LEFT JOIN member_phones mp ON m.id = mp.member_id AND mp.is_active = TRUE
LEFT JOIN member_employment me ON m.id = me.member_id AND me.is_current = TRUE  
LEFT JOIN family_relationships fr ON m.id = fr.member_id
LEFT JOIN members rm ON fr.related_member_id = rm.id
GROUP BY m.id, me.company_name, me.designation, me.profession, me.is_employed, me.employment_start_date
ORDER BY m.church_joining_date DESC

SELECT 
  m.*,
  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(mp.phone_type, ':', mp.phone_number) SEPARATOR '|') as phones,
  me.company_name, me.designation, me.profession, me.is_employed, me.employment_start_date,
  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(fr.relationship_type, ':', rm.first_name, ' ', rm.last_name) SEPARATOR '|') as family_members
FROM members m
LEFT JOIN member_phones mp ON m.id = mp.member_id AND mp.is_active = TRUE
LEFT JOIN member_employment me ON m.id = me.member_id AND me.is_current = TRUE  
LEFT JOIN family_relationships fr ON m.id = fr.member_id
LEFT JOIN members rm ON fr.related_member_id = rm.id
WHERE m.id = ?
GROUP BY m.id

INSERT INTO members (
  title, first_name, middle_name, last_name, dob, email, 
  family_status, church_joining_date
) VALUES (
  '{{ $json.related_member.title }}',
  '{{ $json.related_member.first_name }}',
  '{{ $json.related_member.middle_name }}',
  '{{ $json.related_member.last_name }}',
  '{{ $json.related_member.dob || $today.format('yyyy-MM-dd')}}',
  '{{ $json.related_member.email }}',
  '{{ $json.related_member.family_status }}',
  '{{ $json.related_member.church_joining_date }}'
) 
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
  title = VALUES(title),
  first_name = VALUES(first_name),
  middle_name = VALUES(middle_name),
  last_name = VALUES(last_name),
  dob = VALUES(dob),
  family_status = VALUES(family_status),
  church_joining_date = VALUES(church_joining_date);

SELECT * FROM members WHERE email = '{{ $json.related_member.email }}';

parameters.query:
UPDATE members 
SET 
  profile_pic = CASE WHEN '{{ $('Read/Write Files from Disk').item.json.type }}' = 'profile_pic' THEN '/uploads/{{ $('Read/Write Files from Disk').item.json.filename }}' ELSE profile_pic END,
  family_photo = CASE WHEN '{{ $('Read/Write Files from Disk').item.json.type }}' = 'family_photo' THEN '/uploads/{{ $('Read/Write Files from Disk').item.json.filename }}' ELSE family_photo END
WHERE id = {{ $('Read/Write Files from Disk').item.json.member_id }}

UPDATE members 
SET 
  profile_pic = CASE WHEN '{{ $json.type }}' = 'profile_pic' THEN '/uploads/{{ $json.filename }}' ELSE profile_pic END,
  family_photo = CASE WHEN '{{ $json.type }}' = 'family_photo' THEN '/uploads/{{ $json.filename }}' ELSE family_photo END
WHERE id = {{ $json.member_id }}
